title: Muzzbarketing and Morning Beverages
description: Judge John Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse Thorn clear the docket on this week's episode. They discuss cases regarding old t-shirts, twins sharing a room, morning coffee and more! Plus, follow up letters about Thurl Ravenscroft!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
